PROJECTS

UniGPT: AI Tutor for University Students

This project aims to build a specialized AI model based on the Transformer architecture, tailored specifically for university students. By focusing on academic content, it provides targeted assistance in areas like research, exam prep, and subject-specific queries. Currently in development.

This software leverages OCR technology to search for questions and answers in past exam papers. Currently, itâ€™s in the prototype phase, with ongoing improvements in development. While the system is functional, it indexes each page individually, which impacts its efficiency.

NeuralLott: Lottery Prediction using Neural Networks

This project involves developing a neural network classifier to predict lottery numbers. The model explores patterns in historical data, aiming to improve prediction accuracy while leveraging deep learning techniques. Currently, itâ€™s an experimental approach focused on optimizing model performance.

+ MORE

Punk Battle: Street Fighting Game

A dynamic street-fighting game where players face off against opponents in gritty, urban environments. The project focuses on fast-paced combat mechanics, unique character abilities, and engaging visuals. Currently in development, the game aims to deliver an exciting arcade-style experience.

+ MORE

Papaering: A-Level Exam Paper Search Application

Papering is a Python-based tool designed to help students quickly find A-Level exam papers. Using Beautiful Soup for web scraping and WebBrowser for easy access, it streamlines the process of searching and retrieving relevant papers. The interface, built with PyQt5, ensures a user-friendly experience.
